statements: DELETE FROM urban_noise_pollution_levels WHERE location_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM noise_pollution_data WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND noise_level < 70.0;
DELETE FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Planting Trees' AND city_name = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM noise_pollution_data WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND measurement_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Green Zones' OR (city_name = 'Los Angeles' AND strategy_name = 'Public Awareness') AND strategy_description LIKE '%reduce%';
DELETE FROM NoiseMeasurements WHERE area_id = 2 AND noise_level > 70;
DELETE FROM MitigationStrategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Plant Trees';
DELETE FROM data_sources WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Company';
